item.description:
Hey hey! Looking to stay local this time with a NEW VENUE.  District 7 is a very cool new(ish) spot in downtown Malden.  It's a fireman themed pub and boasts great food and fun! I was there last week to check it out and seems like a cool place to do some trivia.

 

"Tag Team Trivia" starts at 8:00pm. Come early to get a good seat and get on a good team! First place is a $20 gift card to District 7, 2nd place is $10 gift card, and a $5 CASH prize to best team name.  District 7 has $1.99 Bud Light draft and $3 Whale's Tail draft specials. Their menu is really, REALLY great too!

 

District 7 is conveniently located within walking distance of Malden Center Station (Orange Line and Commuter Rail).  There is also ample street parking available.  If this meetup/venue is popular, I may host every week but for now, this is a ONE TIME EVENT.

 

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Tag Team Trivia at District 7 in Malden
